description: This table is to show PRN reasons for all PRN medication orders. If you want to get more information about a medication order, you could link this table to ORDER_MED or ORDER_MEDINFO.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record. NOTE: This is an internal unique identifier for order records in this table and cannot be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each PRN reason.

columns.name: MED_PRN_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The PRN reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ORDERING_DATE
columns.description: The date the order was placed in calendar format.
